official-title.#text: To amend section 1311(a) of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to provide for the recoupment and reallocation of unspent State grant funds, and for other purposes.

text.#text: The

header.#text: Fair and impartial information and services

text.#text: To build and fund operations of an in-person assistance personnel (IPA) program (also known as

To coordinate with other health and human services organizations in the State to broaden outreach (such as Marketplace information on applications for other programs, websites, emails or through IPA call centers) to individuals eligible to enroll in qualified health plans through the Exchange operating in the State.

To produce and disseminate marketing and campaign materials, including brochures, direct mail, print ads, social media and digital and online ads, and TV and radio buys, such materials subject to approval by the
Grants under this paragraph may be used for any of the purposes or activities for which a grant to a State under this subsection may be used, including the following:
